name: Unthanked Hero
description: Aisha Walker is not really enjoying her job as a sidekick. She is forced to be the mature one and handle the responsibilities of Zac Myers who is known to be the “hero” of the town. Behind the scenes, Aisha does all the hard work while Zac steals all the credit she has done. She feels she deserves some sort of recognition whether it be through Zac or by the public. With a sudden turn of a events, she just might get that chance.
